author: Asa Fitch
title: Smartphone Test? Apps Would Listen to Your Cough...
description: Smartphone Test? Apps Would Listen to Your Cough... (Top headline, 13th story, link ) Related stories: U.S. DEATHS SET ANOTHER SINGLE-DAY RECORD... Shutdown backlash coming -- with vengeance... Michigan residents sue Governor Whitmer over lockdown... FORD Tes…
content:
Smartphones already know a lot about us, but now some researchers are betting the devices can also be trained to detect whether we are infected with the new coronavirusjust by listening.
Several teams of artificial-intelligence researchers are working toward… [+269 chars]
